comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: the title is missing an H, it is ChisHolm, which I suspect is related to the iron ore mines in Chisholm, MN. (what we call "The Iron Range" or more often, just "the Range")  I couldn't find any stories of a rescue/disaster during this time, though there was one in 1922.  It's possible this device was developed locally or there was a photo of a rescue at the mine.
